div.style: writing-mode: vertical-rl; transform: rotate(180deg); white-space: nowrap; font-weight: 600; text-align: center; vertical-align: middle; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-size: 24px; padding: 12px 4px; text-shadow: 2px 0 white, -2px 0 white, 0 2px white, 0 -2px white, 1px 1px white, -1px -1px white, 1px -1px white, -1px 1px white;
